title: Call Of Duty Warzone With Greg Miller, Andy Cortez, and Nick Scarpino From Kinda Funny
description:
Donate to Black Lives Matter: http://bit.ly/gs-blm
Donate to COVID-19 Direct Relief: http://bit.ly/gs-covid

On today's Play For All charity stream, we're joined by Kinda Funny's Greg Miller, Andy Cortez, and Nick Scarpino to play some Warzone. Can we catch some wins? Probably not, but it'll be a laugh.

title: Ghost Of Tsushima - Official Cinematic "A Storm Is Coming" 4K Trailer
description: A storm is coming, as Ghost of Tsushima arrives exclusively on PlayStation 4, July 17.

title: How ESO: Greymoor Brings Skyrim Back 1000 Years
description: Kurt Indovina chats with Elder Scrolls Online's creative director Rich Lambert about the game's new expansion Greymoor and what it was like to adapt Skyrim 1000 years in the past.

title: New Releases - Top Games Out This Month -- July 2020
description: New Releases highlights the top new video games on Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One, and PC. This episode takes a look at the new month of July, which is packed with big games like Ghost of Tsushima, Paper Mario: The Origami King, Iron Man VR, Rocket Arena, and the Destroy All Humans remake.
